short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add the 'Maps' tab back to Google search results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google had to remove the "Maps" tab from Google Search. This extension adds it back and also makes the map image container clickable, whenever a location-related search is detected.

Detecting a location-related search currently happens in two ways:
- search query (can contain words like "address", "near me", etc), currently only english keywords are supported 
- certain elements that appear on the Google search results page that indicate that the result is a location. 

This makes life a lot easier by adding the Maps button back to Google Maps and will save you a lot of time! 

CHANGELOG for 1.1: 
- improved location-search detection: added 1 new case
